body_html:
For people looking for ways to compile:

It is in
https://github.com/schmuell/tensorflow/blob/b11ef5128f7341cfc7018ac0771d8939b8535cfc/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md

you need to instal the cuda 8.0 SDK + cudnn 5.1 and add 2 options to cmake
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON -DCUDNN_HOME=c:\local\cudnn

I normally do:
cd tensorflow\contrib\cmake
mkdir build
cd build
cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:\local\Anaconda2\envs\py3\python.exe
-DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=C:\local\Anaconda2\envs\py3\libs\python35.lib
-DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=c:\local\swigwin-3.0.10\swig.exe
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON -DCUDNN_HOME="C:\local\cudnn"
msbuild /p:Configuration=RelWithDebInfo tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj

body:
**For people looking for ways to compile:**

It is in
https://github.com/schmuell/tensorflow/blob/b11ef5128f7341cfc7018ac0771d8939b8535cfc/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md

you need to instal the cuda 8.0 SDK + cudnn 5.1 and add 2 options to cmake
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON  -DCUDNN_HOME=c:\local\cudnn

I normally do:
cd tensorflow\contrib\cmake\
mkdir build
cd build
cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:\local\Anaconda2\envs\py3\python.exe
-DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=C:\local\Anaconda2\envs\py3\libs\python35.lib
-DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=c:\local\swigwin-3.0.10\swig.exe
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON  -DCUDNN_HOME="C:\local\cudnn"
msbuild /p:Configuration=RelWithDebInfo tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj
